resources.string:
"Welcome to GetItDone, the ultimate todo manager!
GetItDone is a to-do app with intuitive user interface, utilising Google's Material design language. An unlimited number of to-dos can be added for managing all your life's to-do needs, including shopping lists, projects at work or anything else you want to track.

Key features include:
Live in the fast lane by adding a task using shortcut, which can be found by long pressing the app icon.
Stay on top of your life by keeping track of what's yet to be done with the Inbox view.
Get a glance of what's coming up next with the Forecast view.
Stay in complete control by deleting and editing Todos.
Never fall behind the schedule with our Reminder feature that sends out a notification at your selected time.
Rewind the moments with the Completed view by reviewing all the completed tasks.

GetItDone keeps track of your daily routine, so you can focus on what really matters."
